channel.title: RS down for half of the day and now its laggy as fuck
channel.description: RS was down for 2-3+ hours and now it seems to be laggy as fuck. Silent update against bots maybe?

item.title: RS down for half of the day and now its laggy as fuck
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Probably a technical issue. Iirc, they’ve discussed in the past that they receive high volumes of traffic (warranted and unwarranted, ie dos attacks) daily. It’s not really noticeable. The website really only seems to go down when they’re making a game update or experience technical issues.

Read full topic

item.title: RS down for half of the day and now its laggy as fuck
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:459181”]go here:

RuneScape

Recent Game Updates - RuneScape Forum

Recent Game Updates - Discuss the latest content additions and changes to the game

whenever the server goes off and then comes back on. They post all updates there. While I’m sure they do do some hidden items almost everything is at least hinted at.

There doesn’t seem to be any new updates. However, they did mention that they will be restarting the server occasionally every day for a week or so due to the large populations at GWD[/quote]
The website was down too, I wasn’t the only one that couldn’t access either, there’s topic on PB.

Once I finally get online, I noticed that there’s ~40% of the servers down. RS didn’t lagg this much yesterday, literally everyone I ask say that they’re lagging, so it isn’t a problem in my end.

ranger squad:

idiot

I know you’re still butthurt cause I rep–'d you. But cmon… lol.

Read full topic
